entry.title: On-going work: Coin Selection Simulation
entry.summary: A post made by Murch on the bitcoin-dev mailing list on September 21, 2016 brought up the topic of an Android wallet for Bitcoin. In the post, Murch clarified that the correct name for the wallet is "Bitcoin Wallet", or "Bitcoin Wallet for Android" if referring specifically to the Android version. The post did not provide further information on the development or availability of the wallet. The bitcoin-dev mailing list is a discussion forum for developers working on the Bitcoin network and related projects.
